Allows players to connect to a dedicated WebSocket server, primarily used by developers to implement custom [[script]]s or modifications to the client through WebSocket connections.

== Syntax ==
:<code>/dedicatedwsserver <server-address> <port></code>
::Attempts to connect to a WebSocket server at the specified address and port.

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|server: string|basic_string}}
:The IP address or the host name of the WebSocket server.

{{argument|be=1|port: int|int}}
: The port through which the connection is made.

== Result ==
{{Result table|onlybe=1}}
{{Result table|The command is incomplete, or any argument is not specified correctly.||unparseable}}
{{Result table|succeed}}
{{Result table}}

== Example ==
* Connect to a WebSocket server at the IP-address <code>192.168.1.10</code> and port <code>3000</code>.
** <code>/dedicatedwsserver 192.168.1.10 3000</code>
